item.description:
We play silly, scoreless, incredibly awesome games of Ultimate Frisbee in partial darkness. Anyone of any age or level of experience is welcome. Please bring a light-colored shirt, if you have one, and let our Organizers know if you have any questions.

There is free parking (see image) off of Rindge Avenue. Also, the Alewife T Station is a few hundred yards away, as is the 83 bus.


http://www.bostonfris...


http://www.bostonfris...

Click here to see a full Google map of the area. If taking the train to Alewife, look around upon exiting for signs directing you to Russell Field.

After playing we'll either go out to a restaurant for food and drinks or go to someone's house for post-frisbee festivities. Hope you'll make it out with us!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be sitting on the bench alongside the football field or throwing an illuminated frisbee.
item.why: Light-Up Frisbees... Need we say more?
item.name: Post-Valentine's Sugar Burn Off on Russell Field
